headlines.description: Everton lifted themselves out of the Premier League relegation zone on Saturday with a surprise 3-1 home win over Chelsea.

video.headline: Is Lampard changing Chelsea's defense too much?

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL PD41 (Is Lampard changing Chelsea's defense too much?) 2019/12/07 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Everton beat Chelsea days after Silva sacking

headlines.description: Liverpool eased to a comfortable 3-0 victory at Bournemouth on Saturday thanks to goals from Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain, Naby Keita and Mohamed Salah.

video.headline: Liverpool playing with a 'different mentality' than last season

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL PD41 (Liverpool playing with a 'different mentality' than last season ) 2019/12/07 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool ease to big win away at Bournemouth

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur bounced back from their first defeat under Jose Mourinho by thrashing Burnley 5-0 in the Premier League on Saturday.

video.headline: Jose Mourinho brings a 'freshness' to Tottenham

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL PD41 (Jose Mourinho brings a 'freshness' to Tottenham) 2019/12/07 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Son's stunning goal helps Spurs crush Burnley

headlines.description: Struggling Watford snapped a string of three straight defeats with a 0-0 draw against Crystal Palace in a scrappy Premier League clash.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watford end losing run with draw against Palace

headlines.description: Manchester United emerged 2-1 winners against rivals Manchester City on Saturday as Marcus Rashford and Anthony Martial found the net.

video.headline: Man United 'outplayed and out-thought' Man City

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL PD41 (Man United 'outplayed and out-thought' Man City) 2019/12/07 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: United beat City to claim spoils in tense derby
